title: Bug 3666CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
description: Bug 3666CodeCompletionHungry code assist (1GDRYW5) jkca (5/15/2001 11:04:56 AM)jresdk 106Under certain circumstances code assist eats too much code.Consider the enclosed class.As a programmer, I must add a parameter to the baz call in bar to make the program correct. Steps:1. Navigate to the `bar` method call in the `bar` method of class `X`.2. Add a parameter to the `baz` method call.
OB: The code currently in the `bar` method is `baz(x.foo())`.
EB: The code should be changed to `baz(x.foo().foo())`.
SR: 1. Open the class `X` in an IDE.2. Navigate to the `bar` method.3. Add a parameter to the `baz` method call by modifying the code to `baz(x.foo().foo())`.
